text:
@realDonaldTrump @Twitter Mr President, explain the 4th paragraph "In the election based almost entirely on mailed-in ballots amid stay-at-home orders due to the coronavirus pandemic, the full results will probably not be clear for days." A Rep won, was the voting done illegally?

https://t.co/oNFIDYQJVe
